import React from 'react'; import {Table} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './PaySlipDetails.css'; class PaySlipDetails extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = this.props.val; } savePaySlipDetails= event =>{ event.preventDefault(); const paySlipData = { firstName: this.props.val.firstName, lastName: this.props.val.lastName, annualSalary: this.props.val.annualSalary, superRate: '', payDate: '', payFrequency: '', grossIncome: this.props.val.grossIncome, incomeTax:this.props.val.incomeTax, netIncome:this.props.val.netIncome, superValue:this.props.val.superValue, payValue:this.props.val.payValue } } render() { return (

Payslip

{this.props.val.firstName + " "}{this.props.val.lastName}
Pay Date {this.props.val.payDate}
Pay Frequency {this.props.val.payFrequency}
Annual Income ${this.props.val.annualSalary}.00
Gross Income ${this.props.val.grossIncome}.00
Income Tax ${this.props.val.incomeTax}.00
Net Income ${this.props.val.netIncome}.00
Super ${this.props.val.superValue}.00
Pay ${this.props.val.payValue}.00
); } } export default PaySlipDetails;
